articles.description: Easing rules months before vaccines take effect would be a "huge mistake", Sage expert says.
articles.content:
media captionProf Peter Openshaw on vaccine developments: "We're all very excited about this as scientists"
The UK would be making a "terrible mistake" to relax Covid measures just months before vac… [+3645 chars]
